statements: UPDATE voter_registration_information SET full_name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main St' WHERE voter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE voter_registration_information SET date_of_birth = '1990-01-01', voter_status = TRUE WHERE voter_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174888';
UPDATE voter_registration_information SET address = '123 Main St', voter_status = false WHERE voter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE voter_registration_information SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE voter_id = '987e6543-e21b-34d5-c654-321987456789';
UPDATE voter_registration SET voter_address = '123 Main St', voter_age = 30 WHERE voter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE voter_history SET registration_status = 'active', last_updated = NOW() WHERE voter_id = '987e6543-21b8-43d1-b654-246781421000';
UPDATE voter_registration SET voter_name = 'John Doe', voter_address = '123 Main St', voter_age = 30 WHERE voter_id = 'a7b765ab-7859-4d0c-902a-4423562b32f9';
UPDATE voter_history SET registration_status = 'Active', last_updated = NOW() WHERE voter_id = 'a7b765ab-7859-4d0c-902a-4423562b32f9';
UPDATE voter_records SET voter_name='John Smith', registration_status=true WHERE voter_id=101;
UPDATE voter_addresses SET city='New York', postal_code='10001' WHERE address_id=201;
UPDATE voter_records SET registration_status = true WHERE voter_id = 12345;
UPDATE voter_addresses SET city = 'New York' WHERE voter_id = 12345 AND state = 'NY';
UPDATE voters SET voter_age = 30 WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE voting_centers SET center_location = 'New Location' WHERE center_id = 3;
UPDATE voters SET voter_age = 35, voter_name = 'John Doe' WHERE voter_id = 1234;
UPDATE voting_centers SET center_location = 'New Location', center_name = 'Updated Center Name' WHERE district_id = 5678;
UPDATE voters SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE voter_preferences SET prefer_sms = true, prefer_email = false, prefer_mail = true WHERE voter_id = 5;
UPDATE voters SET first_name = 'John Doe', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE voter_id = 123;
UPDATE voter_contact SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE voter_id = (SELECT voter_id FROM voters WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe');
